aboutText: I am a full stack web developer based in Ath, Belgium. Recently, I spent 2 years in Vancouver BC, Canada, developing features for TalentMarketplace, a top placement platform matching employers and candidates. I am fluent in French and English. You can find me on LinkedIn, email me or use the contact form at the bottom of this page.
tmpText: TalentMarketplace is a top placement platform matching employers and candidates. I developed new features, improved existing ones, and fixed bugs. I also mentored a junior developer. I worked on both frontend and backend until a backend developer joined the team. Although most of the features I worked on are not accessible to unregistered users, I had the opportunity to develop the employersâ€™ landing pages (links), coding prototypes made by a designer.
